description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. After years of being hit back and forth, the balls have decided to fight back.For the first time, they have the advantage, in numbers and firepower. Try to hold back the ever increasing barrage as the balls escalate their attacks in 32 waves of intense action. This time, the balls will get their revenge!
